Counter Strike Global Offensive, is my childhood, Ever since i was a kid, i loved the Counter Strike Series, played it since Source. But then...I stopped playing it.
2 years passed, and i saw this game called "CSGO" ,i quickly hop on the game, and im greeted by this Intro:
"Valve" "Powered by Source" and then i notice. This is the game i enjoyed for so many years , rebuilt and refurbished. I can't even explain how much i love this Game.
 I have nothing to say about the rest:
Optimization 9/10
Gameplay 10/10
Graphics 8/10 (who cares about graphics)
Community 7/10
Developer Team 9/10 (made some stupid mistakes on the past but they're still very open to the community.
Nostalgia: 20/10 

Total : 10/10
Classic FPS, really nice with the instant action. You choose if you want to play long or short games depending on how much time you have.
